s: New Sega Home Textiles, Inc. creates high quality products for every room in the house. For over 15 years we've been supplying major retailers with spectacular bedding sets and materials. Our factory is qualified with all major retail users, and our products pass all safety and colorfast testing.

We spend one third of our lives asleep, and having high-quality bedding is essential to ensuring that the time spent in bed is comfortable and restful. At New Sega Home Textiles, we produce beautiful and comfortable bedding products that you will absolutely love.
